TopicTitle: [0.90] Two kerbonauts capsule that can be easily integrated with stock parts?

Articles.Content: I'm looking for something like Gemini, because now it almost impossible to fly craft without pilot's (jeb) skills, so i need capsule that i can put pilot and scientist together.
What I did, was put another Mk1 Pod on top of the first I add. Just upside down.
Exactly, two back-to-back Mk1 Command Pods are just right.

Exactly, two back-to-back Mk1 Command Pods are just right.

It's look unnatural, ugly and how do this?

Don't do anything unnatural and ugly. This capsule is exactly what you asked for. Looks like Gemini, holds two Kerbals, fits 1.25m parts, and has a stockalike aesthetic to match the rest of the game. I love it.

You would look at:

FASA historical pack

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24867-FASA-Oct-7th-25-Release-v4-98

BobCat

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24724-0-22-X-BobCat-ind-Historical-spacecraft-thread

Mk 1-1 A2

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98250-WIP-Parts-2-Kerbal-Command-Pod-Mk-1-1-A2-%28Alpha-0-35%29
[thread=98063]This one[/thread] looks way better if you ask me.

had the same question a few days ago and I got alot of great suggestions, but I ended up going in this direction

Edited December 18, 2014 by wdsmith3

Don't do anything unnatural and ugly. This capsule is exactly what you asked for. Looks like Gemini, holds two Kerbals, fits 1.25m parts, and has a stockalike aesthetic to match the rest of the game. I love it.

I too would recommend this.

Or alternately you can go Russian with the Tantares mod.

The Soyuz analog is also a 1.25 2 man pod and is available at the same tech node as the Gemini analog in the other mod
But, but... Stacking Mk1's is the Kerbal way!

I'm pretty sure only one pod is the most kerbal of ways

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Javascript is disabled. View full album

I'm pretty sure only one pod is the most kerbal of ways

http://imgur.com/a/VCWVK

http://imgur.com/a/qRz1i

Hah! thats quite the operation...

But in all seriousness, Tantares is exactly what you are looking for. Has a low tech-2 kerbonaut pod. It also looks gorgeous! I've started a hard mode career with that, DRE and InterstellarLS and it's been a blast. The costs are a bit unbalanced but I just did a big overhaul of the whole mod for my game to balance with stock I can give the cfg if you want.

Try https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/350/Near%20Future%20Spacecraft%20 parts

There's a 2 man capsule in there that fits stock well.

And another one:

HGR, 2 Kerbal Pod (Radish, rather Gemini-ish), with LES tower. Available early in game.

The rest of the mod is very nice and usefull too.
